description:
A shoe for the eco-conscious trail runner. Made with plenty of recycled material and with plush cushioning, they’re easy on the planet and your feet. The dual-density midsole puts firmer foam underfoot for torsional stability and softer foam at the base for maximum cushioning. An ankle wrapping tongue prevents trail debris from getting in, and the grippy outsole sticks to the dirt as you fly along the trail.

  • Breathable uppers and soft microfiber liners are made from 100% recycled materials
  • Comfortable, low-profile Axial TR Tech tongue keeps trail debris out
  • Dual-density EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Rubber toe cap protects against stumps, rocks, and other kickable objects
  • Presa® outsole with ATR compound absorbs shocks and grips to slippery and loose surfaces
  • 4.5mm lugs provide traction in loose terrain
name: Scarpa Spin Planet Trail Running Shoes - Men's
